languages.text: {n}Арлекин непроизвольно вздрагивает, но через секунду его тело вновь расслабляется.{/n} "Вижу, трехокий мон-кай, что зрит Ша'эиль, скверна твоих предков начала поглощать твои тело и душу. Ничтожные глупцы, вечно жаждущие чужой силы и власти. Я проявлю милость, избавив вас от страданий".

traits.locale_text: {n}Арлекин непроизвольно вздрагивает, но через секунду его тело вновь расслабляется.{/n} "Вижу, трехокий мон-кай, что зрит Ша'эиль, скверна твоих предков начала поглощать твои тело и душу. Ничтожные глупцы, вечно жаждущие чужой силы и власти. Я проявлю милость, избавив вас от страданий".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}The Harlequin flinches reflexively but then his body instantly eases back.{/n} "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."
languages.original_text: {n}Арлекин непроизвольно вздрагивает, но через секунду его тело вновь расслабляется.{/n} "Вижу, трехокий мон-кай, что зрит Ша'эиль, скверна твоих предков начала поглощать твои тело и душу. Ничтожные глупцы, вечно жаждущие чужой силы и власти. Я проявлю милость, избавив вас от страданий".

Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンは反射的にたじろぐが、すぐに身体を戻す。{/n}「シャーエイルをのぞく三つ目のモン＝ケイよ、君の父祖の非行が、君の身体と魂を喰らい始めた。君のものではない力を渇望してやまない哀れな愚者だ。君の不幸を終わらせることが、慈悲になるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin flinches reflexively but then his body instantly eases back.{/n} "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンは反射的にたじろぐが、すぐに身体を戻す。{/n}「シャーエイルをのぞく三つ目のモン＝ケイよ、君の父祖の非行が、君の身体と魂を喰らい始めた。君のものではない力を渇望してやまない哀れな愚者だ。君の不幸を終わらせることが、慈悲になるだろう」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}丑角反射性地畏缩着，但随后立刻缓和下来。{/n}“能看到纱芮尔的三眼猴子啊，你的祖先印下的污点，已经开始反噬你的肉体与灵魂了。你们这些可悲的愚者，总是渴望不属于你们的力量。如今唯一的仁慈，就是结束你的苦难。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin flinches reflexively but then his body instantly eases back.{/n} "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角反射性地畏缩着，但随后立刻缓和下来。{/n}“能看到纱芮尔的三眼猴子啊，你的祖先犯下的罪行，已经开始反噬你的肉体与灵魂了。你们这些可悲的愚者，总是渴望不属于你们的力量。如今唯一的仁慈，就是结束你的苦难。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Par réflexe, l'arlequin tressaille, mais se ressaisit très vite.{/n} « Mon-keigh à trois yeux qui pouvez voir dans le Sha'eil, votre corps et votre esprit sont dévorés par la souillure de vos ancêtres. Des imbéciles guidés par une insatiable soif de pouvoir qui n'est pas la vôtre. Mettre fin à vos souffrances serait faire preuve de miséricorde. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin flinches reflexively but then his body instantly eases back.{/n} "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Par réflexe, l'arlequin tressaille, mais se ressaisit très vite.{/n} « Mon-keigh à trois yeux qui pouvez voir dans le Sha'eil, votre corps et votre esprit sont dévorés par le vice de vos ancêtres. Des imbéciles guidés par une insatiable soif de pouvoir qui n'est pas la vôtre. Mettre fin à vos souffrances serait faire preuve de miséricorde. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}El Arlequín retrocede por instinto, pero su cuerpo se relaja al instante.{/n} «Mon-keigh de tres ojos que ve el Sha'eil, la corrupción de tus ancestros ha comenzado a consumir tu cuerpo y tu alma. Necios patéticos con una sed insaciable de un poder que no os corresponde. Poner fin a vuestra miseria será un acto de clemencia».
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin flinches reflexively but then his body instantly eases back.{/n} "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arlequín retrocede por instinto, pero su cuerpo se relaja al instante.{/n} «Mon-keigh de tres ojos que ve el Sha'eil, las flaquezas de tus ancestros han comenzado a consumir tu cuerpo y tu alma. Necios patéticos con una sed insaciable de un poder que no os corresponde. Poner fin a vuestra miseria será un acto de clemencia».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin zuckt reflexhaft zusammen, sein Körper entspannt sich aber sofort wieder.{/n} "Dreiäugiger Chem-Pan-Sey, der nach Sha'eil sieht, der Makel Eurer Ahnen hat begonnen, Euren Körper und Eure Seele zu verzehren. Erbärmliche Narren mit einer unstillbaren Gier nach Macht, die nicht die Eure ist. Eurem Leid ein Ende zu setzen, ist ein Akt der Gnade."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin flinches reflexively but then his body instantly eases back.{/n} "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin zuckt reflexhaft zusammen, sein Körper entspannt sich aber sofort wieder.{/n} "Dreiäugiger Chem-Pan-Sey, der nach Sha'eil sieht, das Laster Eurer Ahnen hat begonnen, Euren Körper und Eure Seele zu verzehren. Erbärmliche Narren mit einer unstillbaren Gier nach Macht, die nicht die Eure ist. Eurem Leid ein Ende zu setzen, ist ein Akt der Gnade."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Arleken, istemsizce irkilse de sonrasında vücudu hemencecik gevşiyor.{/n} "Sha'eil'i gören üç gözlü mon-keigh; atalarının lekesi, vücudunu ve ruhunu tüketmeye başlamış bile. Acınası aptallar sizi, doymak bilmeden bir başkasının gücüne heves etmişsiniz. Sefaletinize son vererek size merhamet etmiş olacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin flinches reflexively but then his body instantly eases back.{/n} "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken, istemsizce irkiliyor ama ardından vücudu anında yeniden gevşiyor.{/n} "Sha'eil'i gören üç gözlü mon-keigh; atalarının lekesi, vücudunu ve ruhunu tüketmeye başlamış bile. Acınası aptallar sizi, bir başkasının gücüne doymak bilmeden heves etmişsiniz. Bu sefalete son vererek size merhamet etmiş olacağız."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
